author: jchris
msg: Introduces native Erlang query servers. Closes COUCHDB-377
Thanks Mark Hammond and Paul Davis for doing most of the work, and Michael McDaniel for the inspiration.

There is still room for improvement on the APIs exposed to the Erlang views, as well as likely a whole lot of work to be done to increase parallelism. But the important part now is that we have native Erlang views.

author: oheger
msg: Removed AbstractHierarchicalConfigurationSource. Hierarchical configuration sources are now much more simple, so this base class is no more needed.

author: veithen
msg: Removed some unused imports and fixed some other warnings.

author: markrmiller
msg: fixes for LUCENE-1748: make Spans an abstract class
